page.title: 19LIFE STYLES:FARM CHILDREN:
page.content: I AM AN EIGHT YEAR OLD GIRL CALLED{ {JULIE}AND I LIVE ON A{FARM}.I ENJOY LIVING ON A{FARM}BECAUSE{FARM CHILDREN HAVE LOTS OF PLACES TO PLAY.THEY ARE NOT SQUASHED IN A TINY GARDEN. YOU GET MORE PLACES TO RIDE A BIKE AND YOU CAN MAKE{DENS}TO PLAY IN. YOU CAN ALSO HELP TO STACK THE{HAY}OR{STRAW}AND YOU CAN FEED THE{ANIMALS}.YOU CAN HELP CHECK{ANIMALS}TO SEE IF THEY ARE ALRIGHT AND YOU CAN ASSIST IN PUTTING UP{FENCES.}BUT YOU HAVE TO BE CAREFUL WHERE YOU PLAY. YOU GAVE TO BE BEWARE OF{FARM MACHINERY}AND IF YOU HAVE A {SHEEP DIP}BECAUSE YOU COULD DROWN IN IT.ALSO SOME{FARMS}HAVE{ELECTRIC {FENCES}AND THEY CAN BE DANGEROUS. {CHILDREN}CAN HURT THEMSELVES VERY EASILY ON A{FARM.
